description: My place is close to Taszo Espresso Bar, Planet Fitness Gym, TD Bank, TMobile, No. 1 Subway train, Riverbank Park. You’ll love my place because of Terrific, CLEAN, well-kept apartment in a great a  neighborhood. Steps away from one of the best parks in the city - Riverbank Park w/ great views of the Hudson and the George Washington Bridge. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: IMMACULATE 1-BDRM UPPER MANHATTAN
